entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
